en.title: Official Appointment
en.content:
FusionExcel is pleased to announce the official appointment of Champion Body Builder, Malek Noor, as our company's spokesman for our amazing Quantum Pendant. Malek Noor's personal experiences and endorsement of FE's Quantum Pendant will take FusionExcel to the next level of growth. It is a great way to start New Year 2007! Welcome, Malek!
 
Click Here to Read Malek Noor's Testimonial
